reco-placement-name.description: name of the cross sell element in English

reco-widget.description: every widget has its own unique ID, which is linked to a set of rules from the Cross Sell. Multiple recommendation elements can be placed on a single page, and can be distinguished with the widgetID

reco-product-source.description: reference product, that some Cross Sell rules use for the calculation
